Wisdom: الظَّنُّ الصَّوَابُ مِنْ شِيَمِ أُولِي الْأَلْبَابِ
enWisdom: Correct conjecture is from the qualities of the people of understanding

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ الْوَرَعِ حُسْنُ الظَّنِّ
enWisdom: The best piety is thinking positively [about others]

Wisdom: إِنَّ اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ يُحِبُّ أَنْ تَكُونَ نِيَّةُ [زِينَةُ] الْإِنْسَانِ لِلنَّاسِ جَمِيلَةً كَمَا يُحِبُّ أَنْ تَكُونَ نِيَّتُهُ [نِيَّتُهُمْ‏] فِي طَاعَتِهِ قَوِيَّةً غَيْرَ مَدْخُولَةٍ
enWisdom: Verily Allah, the Glorified, likes a person’s intention towards the people to be good just as He likes his intention in His obedience to be strong, not shaky

Wisdom: بِحُسْنِ النِّيَّاتِ تَنْجَحُ الْمَطَالِبُ
enWisdom: Through good intentions, what is sought is attained

Wisdom: حُسْنُ الظَّنِّ رَاحَةُ الْقَلْبِ وَسَلَامَةُ الدِّينِ
enWisdom: Thinking positive is a comfort for the heart and security for religion

Wisdom: حُسْنُ الظَّنِّ يُخَفِّفُ الْهَمَّ وَيُنْجِي مِنْ تَقَلُّدِ الْإِثْمِ
enWisdom: Thinking good of others lightens one’s grief and saves one from being shackled by sin

Wisdom: حُسْنُ الظَّنِّ مِنْ أَحْسَنِ الشِّيَمِ وَأَفْضَلِ الْقِسَمِ
enWisdom: Thinking positive of others is one of the best practices and most excellent allotments

Wisdom: حُسْنُ الظَّنِّ مِنْ أَفْضَلِ السَّجَايَا وَأَجْزَلِ الْعَطَايَا
enWisdom: Thinking positive is one of the best attributes and the most bountiful gifts

Wisdom: حُسْنُ الظَّنِّ يُنْجِي مِنْ تَقَلُّدِ الْإِثْمِ
enWisdom: Thinking good of others lightens one’s grief and saves one from being shackled by sin

Wisdom: كَمْ مِنْ مُؤْمِنٍ فَازَ بِهِ الصَّبْرُ وَحُسْنُ الظَّنِّ
enWisdom: How many a believer has succeeded through patience and thinking positively

Wisdom: مَنْ حَسُنَ ظَنُّهُ أَهْمَلَ
enWisdom: One whose supposition [about others] is good, overlooks [their lapses]

Wisdom: مَنْ ظَنَّ بِكَ خَيْراً فَصَدِّقْ ظَنَّهُ
enWisdom: When one thinks good of you, then prove his supposition to be true

Wisdom: مَنْ حَسُنَ ظَنُّهُ فَازَ بِالْجَنَّةِ
enWisdom: One who thinks positively [about others] attains Paradise

Wisdom: مَنْ حَسُنَ ظَنُّهُ بِالنَّاسِ حَازَ مِنْهُمُ الْمَحَبَّةَ
enWisdom: One who thinks positively about people earns love from them

Wisdom: مَنْ حَسُنَ ظَنُّهُ بِاللَّهِ فَازَ بِالْجَنَّةِ
enWisdom: One who thinks positively [about others] attains Paradise

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يُحْسِنْ ظَنَّهُ اسْتَوْحَشَ مِنْ كُلِّ أَحَدٍ
enWisdom: One who does not think positively of others alienates himself from everyone

Wisdom: إِذَا اسْتَوْلَى الْفَسَادُ عَلَى الزَّمَانِ وَأَهْلِهِ ثُمَّ أَحْسَنَ الظَّنَّ رَجُلٌ بِرَجُلٍ فَقَدْ غَرَّرَ
enWisdom: In an age when corruption prevails over a people, if a man thinks positive of another man then he has put himself in peril

Wisdom: الْجَمَالُ الظَّاهِرُ حُسْنُ الصُّورَةِ الْجَمَالُ الْبَاطِنُ حُسْنُ السَّرِيرَةِ
enWisdom: A good countenance is an apparent beauty

Wisdom: الضَّمَائِرُ الصِّحَاحُ أَصْدَقُ شَهَادَةً مِنَ الْأَلْسُنِ الْفِصَاحِ
enWisdom: Healthy consciences are more truthful witnesses than eloquent tongues

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ الذَّخَائِرِ حُسْنُ الضَّمَائِرِ
enWisdom: The best of provisions is having good inner consciences

Wisdom: زِينَةُ الْبَوَاطِنِ أَجْمَلُ مِنْ زِينَةِ الظَّوَاهِرِ
enWisdom: NULL

Wisdom: زَيْنُ الْإِيمَانِ طَهَارَةُ السَّرَائِرِ وَحُسْنُ الْعَمَلِ فِي الظَّاهِرِ
enWisdom: The embellishment of faith is [in] purity of one’s innermost thoughts [and secrets] and [performing] good deeds in the open

Wisdom: طُوبَى لِمَنْ صَلُحَتْ سَرِيرَتُهُ وَحَسُنَتْ عَلَانِيَتُهُ وَعَزَلَ عَنِ النَّاسِ شَرَّهُ
enWisdom: Blessed is the one whose inward thoughts are good, whose outward [character] is righteous and who does not harm the people

Wisdom: مَنْ حَسُنَتْ سَرِيرَتُهُ حَسُنَتْ عَلَانِيَتُهُ
enWisdom: One whose inward [feeling] is good, his outward [character] is righteous

Wisdom: مَنْ حَسُنَتْ سَرِيرَتُهُ لَمْ يَخَفْ أَحَداً
enWisdom: One whose inward [feeling] is good [and honourable] is not afraid of anyone
